title: Vehicle
description: Gives this entity a trunk and ammo inventory, as well as gunnar control parameters.

ammo_inventory.title: Ammo Inventory
ammo_inventory.description: Inventory object representing the ammo slots of this entity (if it has weapons). Setting the bar of this object has no effect.

trunk_inventory.title: Trunk Inventory
trunk_inventory.description: Inventory object representing regular item storage.

driver_is_main_gunner.title: Driver Is Main Gunner
driver_is_main_gunner.description: Whether or not the driver should control the vehicles weapon, or if that responsibility should go to the passenger.

selected_gun_index.title: Selected Gun Index
selected_gun_index.description: Which gun is currently selected, 1-indexed. Included regardless of whether or not this vehicle has a weapon.
